translation.start.narration: Welcome to Hell Study! This game is about a son whose father want to make his son an engineer but son want to do other profession.
translation.askyou.narration: Do you want to play Hell  Study?
translation.goahead.narration: So let's start from Nursery. From the kindergarden, do you want to go high school to learn more?
translation.highschool.narration: Welcome to high school! After hoghschool what you will do? Doctor, Engineer or Scientist or other profession?
translation.nowheretogo.narration:
Your father is an Engineer so you have no choice rather than to become an Engineer.Now take a deep breathe and throw your other options in dustbin and say engineer. 
    You have to fight with your father to get your decision. Now click fight. You have no option.
translation.update.narration: your health is {PHP} and opponent's health is {OHP}. It strikes again!
translation.forward.narration: Fight didn't end. Give your best.Do you want to continue?
translation.gobuddy.narration: You have to fight otherwise it's not possible to get your passion. Try man!!
translation.youwon.narration: You won man!!! Now you can go as your wish.
translation.tryagain.narration: Try again buddy!! You can do this.!! Fight again buddy. Do you want to try?
translation.niceguy.narration: You are a copy of your father!! Chill on man! Your father will be very happy to know this. Let's have a party. After B.Tech do you wanna M.Tech? Yes or NO?
translation.genious.narration: Genius man!! You are truely a student to learn!! Proud of you. I pray to GOD to give you a good job after M.Tech.
translation.noproblem.narration: Now go your wish. No one will stop you. Get a good job!
translation.fuckoff.narration: No way to shortcut BSDK! You don't have option. Take basic knowledge first as it's necessary. So choose to go High School by saying YES.
translation.end.narration: Goodbye from this boring game!I think it's boring!! If you loved it then don't forget to give feedback.
